domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

text:
Republicans in Congress included a bailout for the private jet industry in the coronavirus stimulus package: 

--NO excise taxes for the rest of the year 

--NO fuel taxes for the rest of the year 

--Billions in loans & loan guarantees

Meanwhile, American workers got crumbs.
